addRemoveCleverClassrooms: 造訪 https://clever.com/ 並確認你的 classroom 已連接到 Code.org。
addRemoveGoogleClassrooms: 造訪 https://classroom.google.com/ 以添加或移除 classroom。
addSectionName: 為你的學習小組命名，這可以幫你記住它是在哪個 classroom 中，你的學生也能看到此名稱。
addSectionNameHint: 例如：CS 介紹 - 階段 2
addStudentsMultipleInstructions: Type or paste the names of your students, one per line.
addStudentsSyncThirdParty: 從現存的 classroom 中同步學生清單（第三方工具）
administratorResourcesDescription: 閱讀這些資源以便開始拓展電腦科學的機會。
administratorResourcesHeading: 管理員：在你的學校或校區推廣電腦科學
allowEditingInstructions: 當學生應該進行評量時「允許編輯」 。
announcementHeadingFacilitatorApp: 加入我們的輔導員發展計畫
announcementDescriptionFacilitatorApp: 透過舉辦 Code.org 課程的專業學習工作坊以協助教師授課。
anotherHoCDesc: 加油！試試下一個「一小時玩程式」活動。
anotherHoCTitle: 試試其它的「一小時玩程式」
applabMarketingDesc: 查看示例專案、觀看示範影片，進一步了解 App Lab 還可以做些什麼。
applabProjectDesc: 現在，你已初步認識了 App Lab，接下來開始創建你自己的應用程式吧 - 試著做個小測驗、小故事，或一個簡單的遊戲。
applabTutorialDesc: 準備好嘗試 JavaScript 了嗎？用圖像式或是文字式的 JavaScript 編程，設計出一個應用程式後，就可以馬上分享你的 App 囉。適合年齡 13+。
assignACourse: 為學習小組分配一個課程，或是創建你自己的課程。
authorizeGoogleClassrooms: 點擊此處取得 Google Classroom 授權。
authorizeGoogleClassroomsText: 在能夠同步 Google Classroom 之前，你必須授權允許 Code.org 存取你的 Google Classroom 帳戶。
autolock: 注意：此階段於 24 小時後自動上鎖。
bothSectionsQuestion: 你想讓學生同時加入二個學習小組嗎？
censusConnection: 你和這所學校的關係是？
censusExistingInaccuracy: I believe that the computer science categorization for this school is inaccurate
censusExistingInaccuracyReason: Explain why you think that the categorization for this school is inaccurate:
censusExistingInaccuracyTip: If you think that we've incorrectly categorized the school as teaching or not teaching CS, please check this box. We will review your request.
censusExistingInaccuracyTipLink: Read more about how we define computer science and categorize schools.
censusEthicalSocial: Ethical and social issues in computing
censusFollowUp: 你的學校提供了一學期或一學年的計算機科學課程！課程包含了哪些主題？
censusFollowUpTellUsMore: 請告訴我們更多關於這個課程的資訊。例如：課程的名稱、多久上課一次、說明教學內容。
censusHeading: 告訴我們關於你的學校
censusGameDesign: 使用遊戲布局工具來設計遊戲，不需要編碼或是電腦程式設計
censusHowManyAfterSchool: 有多少學生在課後計劃中進行計算機編程？
censusHowManyHoC: 有多少學生使用 Hour of Code？
censusHowManyTenHours: 有多少學生花 10 小時以上的時間寫程式，並運用在非電腦科學課程中（如科技教育、數學、科學、藝術、圖書館或課堂管理）？
censusHowManyTwentyHours: 多少學生參加每學期/學年至少20小時的編碼/電腦程式設計的電腦科學學科？
censusInvalidEmail: 請輸入一個有效的電子郵件信箱
censusOtherCourse: 這所學校教其他包含不多過20個小時的電腦課程（例如學習使用軟件、電腦知識、網頁設計、HTML或CSS等）
censusOtherDescribe: 其他 (請在下方予以說明)
censusPledge: I pledge to expand computer science offerings at my school, and to engage a diverse group of students, to bring opportunity to all.
censusRequired: 你漏填一或多個必要的欄位。
censusRequiredEmail: 必填。請輸入你的電子郵件。
censusRequiredSchool: 必填。請輸入你的學校資訊。
censusRequiredShare: Required. Please let us know if we can share your information.
censusTextBased: 基於文字的程式設計語言，像是 Java、JavaScript、Python、C++ 等 (不包括 HTML 或 CSS)
censusWebDesign: 使用 HTML 或 CSS 的網頁設計
challengeLevelIntro: 挑戰關卡是設計用來激盪你腦力的課程！只要盡你所能就可以了！
challengeLevelPassText: However, you could've done it with only {idealBlocks, plural, one {1 block} other {# blocks}}. Can you make your program even better?
changeLoginTypeQuestion: 要更改學生的登入類型？
changeLoginTypeToPicture_button: 更改成用通關圖片登入
changeLoginTypeToPicture_description: 如果你想要學生改用選擇圖片的方式登入，更改為通關圖片登入。
changeLoginTypeToWord_button: 更改成用通關文字登入
changeLoginTypeToWord_description: 如果你想要學生使用輸入文字的方式來換入，請更改成用通關文字登入。
changeLoginTypeToWordOrPicture_button: 更改為圖片或文字登入
changeLoginTypeToWordOrPicture_descripti: 如果你的學生沒有電子信箱，你可以為他們建立帳號。如果你選擇圖片登入，你的學生會用點選圖片的方式登入；如果你選擇文字登入，學生將會用輸入文字的方式登入。
clearPuzzleConfirm: 這會讓這一關的狀態重置。之前你所新增或改變的都將會回復原狀。
cleverConnectDialogText: 如果你有現有的 Code.org 帳號，你可以連結到 Clever。這樣一來，你也能從 Clever Portal 登入到你的現有帳號。
cleverConnectDialogTitle: 你已經有 Code.org 的帳號了嗎？
cleverForceConnectDialogTitle: Link your Clever login to your Code.org account
cleverForceConnectDialogContent: It looks like you already have a Code.org account that uses the same email address as your Clever account. Click the "Link my account" button and then log into your existing Code.org account. This will connect your Clever login with your existing Code.org account so that you can use Clever to log into the Code.org account in the future.
codeTooltip: 檢視產生的 JavaScript 代碼。
commentTooltip: Leave a message for yourself, or anyone else reading your code.
completedWithoutRecommendedBlock: 恭喜！你完成了第 {puzzleNumber} 關（你可以試著用其他積木組合出更完美的程式）。
congratsCertificateHeading: You Earned a Certificate of Completion
congratsCertificatePersonalize: 在證書上留下你的英文姓名
congratsCertificateContinue: Now, keep going with our other courses, or see more options to Learn beyond an Hour below.
congratsStudentHeading: Students: Continue Learning Beyond an Hour
congratsTeacherCodeOrgDesc: Code.org offers courses across K-12 at no cost to schools. And, if you’d like help getting started, we have hands-on professional learning workshops around the country.
congratsTeacherExternalDesc: Compare options by different partners, organized by grade band.
congratsTeacherHeading: Teachers: Bring Computer Science to Your Classroom
contactSupport: Please contact teacher@code.org for any questions or concerns.
contactWithoutEmail: If you have any questions, please contact us:
containedLevelRunDisabledTooltip: 在運行程式前，你必須先答對這個問題。
contractMatchBadDomainName: 有一個或多個您的定義域欄位的名稱錯誤。
contractMatchBadDomainSize: 您的契約裡的定義域沒有正確的項目數。
contractMatchBadDomainType: 有一個或多個您的定義域欄位的類型錯誤，或順序錯誤。
contractMatchBadNameCase: 函式名稱是區分英文大小寫的，試著更改契約名稱的大小寫。
copyStudentsConfirm: Yes, I want to copy student(s) to be in this current section AND the new section.
courseBlocksCsfExpressHeading: 計算機科學基礎快速課程
courseBlocksCsfExpressDescription: 讓學生自行開始學習的好選擇。你會透過拖放程式積木學到電腦科學的基礎。建立你自己的 繪畫與遊戲。
courseBlocksCsfYoungHeading: 適合小學生的電腦科學基礎
courseBlocksCsfYoungDescription: 適合小學教室裡還不會認字的學生
courseBlocksCsfOlderDescription: 適合小學教室裡較年長的學生
courseBlocksGradeBands612Description: 使用程式積木、JavaScript、CSS、HTML 等等建立真正能用的程式、遊戲和網站。
courseBlocksGradeBandsContainerDescripti: 瀏覽我們來自 Code.org 與協力伙伴的課程目錄。
courseBlocksGradeBandsElementaryDescript: 老師們都說我們的五個基礎課程棒極了，就連學齡前的孩子們都覺得有趣。
courseBlocksGradeBandsHighDescription: 我們提供了兩個為期一年的高中課程：一個是介紹課程，另一個是 AP 課程。二個課程目標都是在讓更多人學習計算機科學知識。
courseBlocksGradeBandsK5Description: 學習製作你自己的遊戲、 應用程式或電腦繪圖。
courseBlocksGradeBandsMiddleDescription: 我們新推出的中學課程可以拿來當作一個學期或是一個學年的電腦科學課程教材。
courseBlocksGradeBandsUniversityDescript: Go beyond Code.org and take university courses online or learn a new programming language.
courseBlocksToolsTitleTeacher: Tools and resources for your classroom
courseBlocksToolsTitleNonEn: Tools for middle and high school (English only)
courseBlocksToolsDescription: In addition to our courses, teachers can use tools to teach students how to create apps, animations, games, or websites. We also have lessons and widgets to teach encryption, text compression, and other computer science concepts. Browse our other resources to inspire students with posters, videos, or by inviting guest speakers.
courseBlocksToolsAppLabDescription: App Lab 是個編程環境，你可以在裡頭做些簡單的應用程式。可以用積木或是 JavaScript 的方式設計，製作完後也能分享。
courseBlocksToolsGameLabDescription: Game Lab is a programming environment where you can make simple animations and games with objects and characters that interact with each other.
courseBlocksToolsWebLabDescription: Web Lab is a programming environment where you can make simple web pages using HTML and CSS. Design your web pages and share your site in seconds.
courseBlocksToolsWidgetsDescription: Students can explore concepts from our CS Principles course hands-on using these digital tools. Use the widgets on their own, or create a single-concept lesson for your class.
courseBlocksToolsInspireDescription: Find a volunteer guest speaker or use these videos, posters, and how-to resources to inspire students to try computer science.
courseBlocksToolsVideoDescription: 這些影片可用於任何電腦科學課程, 以支援學習。
courseCatalogDescription: Code.org offers courses across K-12 at no cost to schools. And, if you’d like help getting started, we also offer online professional learning at no cost.
coursesCardDescription: 尋找新的課程，不斷挑戰自己。
coursesHeadingDescription: 創建一個帳戶以儲存你的進度和專案，或者，你也可以先體驗看看。這兒的課程都是免費的。
coursesHeadingStudent: 在 Code Studio 上學習
coursesHeadingSubText: {studentsCount} 百萬名學生在這兒撰寫了超過 {linesCount} 行的程式碼。
coursesHeadingTeacher: 使用 Code Studio 教學
coursesUiTipsTeacherCourses: 我們已經為更新了這個教師專用頁面，你可以在這裡為你的班級尋找下一個課程。
createAccountApplabDesc: With an account, you can save your progress. You can work on your App Lab project later, play it on your phone, or share it with friends.
createAccountDesc: Join Code.org! With an account you’ll be able to save your course progress, keep your apps and games, and share your favorites in the public gallery.
createAccountToShare: 建立 Code.org 帳號以共用你的專案
createAccountToShareDescription: You must create a Code.org account before you can share and publish your project. Creating an account will also let you save your progress and continue to work on your project later.
createNewClassroom: 建立一個新的學習小組以開始配置課程並觀看學生的學習進度。
createSectionsInfo: 建立新的學習小組，並添加學生到小組中。學習小組可以協助你將學生分成更小的群組，以便你可以分別追蹤他們的進度和管理他們的帳戶。
csfDescription: Start learning an introduction to computer science on Code Studio with these 20 hour courses for all ages.
csfAcceleratedDesc: Keep going with our intro course! Learn the fundamentals of computer science with drag & drop blocks. Create your own drawings and games.
csfExpressDesc: Keep going with our intro course! Learn the fundamentals of computer science with drag & drop blocks. Create your own drawings and games.
dataLimitAlert: App 讀寫數據庫次數過於頻繁，可能因此發生無法預期的錯誤。若您持續遇到此問題，請通知 app 擁有者。
dataTabExplanation: 你的 app 可以儲存資料（像是得分紀錄或是問卷調查結果），即便你重置了你的 app，資料仍會保留。在你運行你的 app 之前，在這個頁籤上計畫你的鍵/值對或你的資料表內容。你可以在這直接新增、刪除、修改資料，或者在 app 中透過資料類的積木來進行操作。
dataTableCaption: 創建資料表，將多個資料儲在一列中的多個欄位裡。
deleteSectionConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this section? You will not be able to undo this.
deleteSectionHideSuggestion: If you simply want to remove this section from your list of sections, consider using the 'Hide section' option instead.
disabledButtonsInfo: 由於一小時玩程式（Hour of Code）活動期間（12月3日 - 11日）的流量較高，你的進度和代碼將不會被保存。
disabledButtonsWhy: 為什麼我的泡泡是灰色的？
disabledProgress1: 你的課程進度將不會被保存，因為一小時玩程式（Hour of Code）活動期間（12月3日 - 11日）的流量較高。
disabledProgress2: 這就是所有泡泡都是灰色的原因（別擔心，這週之前的進度都還會留著）。
disabledProgress3: 也許你可以在這週試試一小時玩程式（Hour of Code）的活動課程。
discountCodeSchoolConfirm: Before you can receive your code, please verify the school at which you teach:
dropletBlock_andOperator_description: 只有當兩個表達式同時為 true 時返回結果為 true，否則返回 false
dropletBlock_assign_x_description: 將一個值分配給以前宣告的變數。
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_description: 調用一個已經命名的、不帶參數的函式。
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_n_descriptio: 調用一個已經定義的、帶有多個參數的函式。
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_n_signatureO: 呼叫一個帶有參數的函式
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_d: 宣告一個變數並分配到一個帶有初始值的陣列
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_s: 宣告一個分配到陣列的變數
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_description: 宣告並分配一個初始值給變數。
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_desc: 宣告的代碼現在將使用一個變數，並將其分配使用者提供的初始值
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_sign: 提示使用者輸入一個值並將其儲存
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_promptNum_d: 宣告的代碼現在將使用一個變數，並將其分配使用者提供的初始值
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_promptNum_s: 提示使用者輸入一個值並將其儲存
dropletBlock_declareNoAssign_x_descripti: 宣告一個具有給定名稱的變數。
dropletBlock_equalityOperator_descriptio: 測試兩個值是否相等。如果左側運算式的值等於右側，就返回 true，否則返回 false。
dropletBlock_forLoop_i_0_4_description: 創建一個迴圈，裡頭可以有初始運算式、條件運算式、遞增運算式；以及一個為每個迴圈反複運算中執行的陳述句。
dropletBlock_functionParams_n_descriptio: 為驅動電腦執行操作的一組參數命名。
dropletBlock_functionParams_n_signatureO: 定義一個帶參數的函式
dropletBlock_functionParams_none_descrip: 為你想要讓電腦執行的一組操作命名。
dropletBlock_getTime_description: 獲取目前時間，以毫秒為單位。
dropletBlock_greaterThanOperator_descrip: 測試一個數字是否大於另一個數字。如果左側運算式的數字大於右側運算式的數字，則返回 true。
dropletBlock_greaterThanOrEqualOperator_: 測試一個值是否大於或等於另一個值。如果左側運算式的值大於或等於右側運算式的值則返回 true。
dropletBlock_ifBlock_description: 若是指定的條件為 true，執行一個陳述句。
dropletBlock_ifElseBlock_description: 若是指定的條件為 true，執行一個陳述句；不然就執行否則子句中的陳述句。
dropletBlock_inequalityOperator_descript: 測試兩個值是否不相等。如果左側運算式的值不等於右側，就返回 true，否則返回 false。
dropletBlock_lessThanOperator_descriptio: 測試一個數字是否小於另一個數字。如果左側運算式的數字小於右側運算式的數字，則返回 true。
dropletBlock_lessThanOrEqualOperator_des: 測試一個值是否小於或等於另一個值。如果左側運算式的值小於或等於右側運算式的值，則返回 true。
dropletBlock_mathAbs_description: 取得 x 的絕對值
dropletBlock_mathMax_description: 取得一個或多個值（n1, n2, ..., nX）之中的最大值。
dropletBlock_mathMax_param0_description: 一個或多個數字來比較。
dropletBlock_mathMin_description: 取得一個或多個值（n1, n2, ..., nX）之中的最小值。
dropletBlock_mathMin_param0_description: 一個或多個數字來比較。
dropletBlock_mathRandom_description: 返回一個大於等於 0，且小於 1 的隨機數字。
dropletBlock_mathRound_description: 四捨五入取得數字的概數。
dropletBlock_notOperator_description: 如果運算式可以被轉換就返回 false，否則返回 true。
dropletBlock_orOperator_description: 只有當其中一個運算式為 true 時返回結果為 true，否則返回 false。
dropletBlock_playSound_description: 播放指定網址上的 MP3 音訊檔案。
dropletBlock_playSound_param0_descriptio: 音訊檔案的網址。可以為專案名稱或外部網址。
dropletBlock_playSound_param1_descriptio: If true, loop the sound until asked to stop.
dropletBlock_randomNumber_description: 從限定的範圍返回一個隨機的數字。
dropletBlock_stopSound_description: 停止播放指定網址的音訊檔案；如果沒有提供指定網址，就停止播放全部音訊。
dropletBlock_stopSound_param0_descriptio: 音訊檔案的網址可以是專案名稱或外部網址。
dropletBlock_whileBlock_description: 創建一個條件運算式和一個為每個迴圈反覆運算中執行的語句塊組成的一個迴圈。迴圈將繼續執行，只要條件計算為 true
editSectionDetails: 編輯學習小組詳細資訊
eligibilityExplanation: In order to be eligible to receive a code for a subsidized Circuit Playground kit, you must meet the following requirements:
eligibilityReqPD: You attended CS Discoveries TeacherCon 2017, or are a CS Discoveries facilitator.
eligibilityReqPDFail: We did not find the email address associated with this account under the list of people who attended CS Discoveries TeacherCon 2017, or in our list of CS Discoveries facilitators and piloters. If you meet the above requirements, please email us at teacher@code.org.
eligibilityReqStudentCount: Ten students in one of your sections have completed the first three units of CS Discoveries.
eligibilityReqStudentCountFail: Sorry, it doesn't look like you have enough students in your sections that have made progress in Units 2 and 3. Please check back here once your students have finished the first semester of CS Discoveries. If you are using a different account to track the progress of students or if you think there has been an error in detecting how much progress your students have made in Units 2 and 3, please contact us at teacher@code.org.
eligibilityReqYear: You commit to teach the second semester of CS Discoveries, including Unit 6.
eligibilityReqYearConfirmInstructions: Please confirm that you will be teaching Unit 6 of CS Discoveries with your students and when you will be teaching it:
eligibilityReqYearFail: The subsidy for classroom kits of the Adafruit Circuit Playground is available thanks to the generosity of Code.org's donors such as Microsoft, Facebook, Infosys Foundation, Omidyar Network, and Google. Additionally, Adafruit and DHL are helping to lower the cost of these kits directly. Our intention is that these subsidized kits are going to teachers who are teaching all units of CS Discoveries to their students (whether over 1 or 2 years), as we want to lower the barrier to teaching a hardware-based unit.
eligibilitySchoolUnknown: Because your school isn't listed, we were not able to look up the data on what percent of your students are eligible for free/reduced-price lunches.
eligibilityYearAfter: I do not plan on teaching it until after the '18-'19 school year.
eligibilityYearDecline: Unfortunately, we can only offer codes for subsidized kits for teachers who know they will be teaching Unit 6 of CS Discoveries by the '18-'19 school year. For any questions or concerns, please contact us at teacher@code.org.
eligibilityYearNo: No, I am not planning on teaching Unit 6 of CS Discoveries.
eligibilityYearYes1718: Yes, I plan on teaching it during the '17-'18 school year.
eligibilityYearYes1819: Yes, I plan on teaching it during the '18-'19 school year.
emailConfirmationText: You must confirm the email address you use to sign into this account before we can convert your account to a teacher account.
emailAddressPolicy: 基於隱私保護，Code.org 不會將學生的電子信箱儲存為可取得的格式。
emptyBlockInFunction: 函式 {name} 有未完成的輸入。
emptyBlockInVariable: 變數 {name} 有未完成的輸入。
emptyBlocksErrorMsg: 「重複」和「如果」積木裡需要有其它的程式才會有用。請確定在積木裡頭添加了合適的程式。
emptyExampleBlockErrorMsg: 函式 {functionName} 至少需要兩個例子。請確定每個例子都有一個呼叫（call）和結果（result）。
emptyFunctionBlocksErrorMsg: 函式積木裡面需要放其他積木才會有用。
emptyFunctionalBlock: 你有一塊未填入數據的積木。
emptyTopLevelBlock: 沒有可運行的程式。您必須將連接一個積木到 {topLevelBlockName} 積木的下方。
enableMakerDialogWarning: 警告：除非你有 Adafruit Circuit Playground board，否則你的 app 將無法正常運作。
enableMakerDialogDescription: 這是今年計算機科學探索課程中的新測試功能，前往設定頁面以取得更多資訊：
englishOnlyWarning: 抱歉！這個階段不可在您的語言中進行。這個階段的困難處是用一組還未能被翻譯的混合英文字和字母。您可以繼續到階段{nextStage}。
enrollmentDescription: 在下面輸入學習小組代碼就可以加入老師的 classroom。老師能檢視你的課程進度、專案，在你忘記密碼時也能幫你重新設定。
errorEmptyFunctionBlockModal: 你的函式定義內需要有程式積木。點擊「編輯」並拖曳程式積木到綠色積木中。
errorExceededLimitedBlocks: You did it! Now go find the pattern in your code and take out the extra blocks. You can only use {limit} of these blocks:
errorIncompleteBlockInFunction: 點擊「編輯」以確定你的函式定義中沒有缺少任何積木。
errorGenericLintError: 你的程式有需要修正的地方，將鼠標懸停在靠近行號旁的圖示上，以查看更多提示。
errorParamInputUnattached: 在工作區中，記得在函式積木的每個參數上放置積木。
errorRequiredParamsMissing: 透過點擊「編輯」可以為你的函式建立必要的參數，拖曳新的參數積木到你的函式定義中。
errorUnusedFunction: 你建立了一個函式，但從來沒在工作區上用過！點擊工具箱的「函式」，確認在你在程式中有沒有使用到它。
errorUnusedParam: 你添加了一個參數積木，但在定義中沒有用到它。點擊「編輯」並在綠色積木裡放置參數積木，以確保使用到你的參數。
exactNumberOfBlocks: Only {numBlocks, plural, one {1 block} other {# blocks}} used!
exampleErrorMessage: 函式 {functionName} 中有一個或多個例子需要調整。請確認它們符合你的定義，並有正確的返回值。
examplesFailedOnClose: 至少一個例子與你的定義不相符。請在關閉前檢查你的例子。
explainLessonExtras: When Lesson Extras is on, students will end each lesson with some bonus challenges and creative projects rather than being automatically advanced to the next lesson. This feature gives students the opportunity to expand their knowledge and further practice, without getting ahead of their classmates.
explainPairProgramming: When pair programming is turned on, students can choose to work with a classmate at the same computer. Turn this setting on if you want students to be able to work together while sharing progress.
extrasNoBonusLevels: 沒有額外需要完成的關卡。
extraTopBlocks: 你有一些未連接的程式積木。
extraTopBlocksWhenRun: 你的一些未連接的程式積木，你是否要將這些連接在「當運行時」積木？
featureUnpublishedWarning: This project is currently unpublished. It can still be marked as featured, but it will not show in the gallery until the owner publishes it.
fewerNumberOfBlocks: Fewer than {numBlocks, plural, one {1 block} other {# blocks}} used!
finalStage: 恭喜你！你完成了最後一關。
finalStageTrophies: 恭喜! 你完成了最後關卡並且贏得了 {numTrophies, plural, one {1 個獎盃} other {# 個獎盃}}。
findCourseDescription: Try new courses to add them to your homepage.
findGuestSpeakerDescription: 邀請當地志願者拜訪你的班級，或透過視頻聊天的方式來激勵學生。
findLocalClassHeading: 尋找本地的計算機科學課程
findLocalClassDescription: Find a local after-school program, summer camp, or school to learn in person.
generatedCodeInfo: 像是 {berkeleyLink} 和 {harvardLink} 這樣的頂尖大學也都在教授這種積木式（block-based）的編程。不過萬變不離其宗，你組合的每個積木，都可以用 JavaScript（世界廣泛使用的編程語言之一）來表示：
shortGeneratedCodeInfo: Even top universities teach block-based coding (e.g., {berkeleyLink}, {harvardLink}). The blocks you use can also be shown in JavaScript, the most widely used coding language:
hashError: 抱歉，「%1」未對應任何已保存的程式。
hiddenScriptTooltip: Please select a section before trying to toggle whether or not the unit is visible to your students.
homepageUiTipAlreadyHome: 這是為已經登入者設計的個別化頁面，你可以在這兒找到所有相關資源。
homepageUiTipsBeforeDialogTitle: 我們已將你的教師主頁個人化
homepageUiTipsBeforeDialogBody: 這個新的設計可以讓你在使用班級相關資源時更方便，像是閱讀你的下一個計畫或是檢視學生進度。
homepageUiTipsAfterDialogBody: 若要進一步了解這些更動，請造訪我們的部落格。
importFromClever: 從 Clever 匯入學習小組
incorrectAnswerBody: 答錯囉！別氣餒，再接再厲！
incorrectSolutionBody: 你的解法不大正確！別氣餒，再接再厲！
joinSectionDescription: 輸入老師的學習小組代碼來加入它。
joinTextTooltip: 通過串起任意數量的項目來建立一段文字。
justDidHourOfCode: 我完成了 #HourOfCode - 快來看看吧！ @codeorg
justDidHourOfCodeDonor: I just did the #HourOfCode - check it out! (Thanks {donor_twitter} for supporting @codeorg)
keyValueCaption: 使用鍵/值對來儲存帶有唯一值的一連串數據。
levelIncompleteError: 繼續編程！有些地方還不完全正確。
lockFollowing: 鎖住下列已被解鎖的階段：
lockAssessmentLong: 當學生完成時，使用「上鎖設定」按鈕將評量上鎖。
lockStageInstructions: 當時間到時，「上鎖階段」以隱藏問題。
loginTypeCleverDescription: 將你的 Code.org 學習小組與現有的 Clever section 同步。
loginTypeEmailDescription: 每位學生用自己的電子信箱建立自己的 Code.org 帳戶（100% 隱私保護*）。
loginTypeEmailResetDescription: 你可以隨時將學生密碼重設，只要選擇重設密碼，輸入新的，然後點擊儲存就可以了。
loginTypeEmailLongDescription: 這個學習小組使用電子郵件登入。這表示你的學生每一位都使用他們自己的電子郵件與密碼來管理他們自己的帳號。學生們應該使用在頁面上方可以找到的登入按鈕來登入。
loginTypeGoogleClassroomDescription: 將你的 Code.org 學習小組與現有的 Google Classroom 同步。
loginTypeMicrosoftClassroomDescription: 將你的 Code.org 學習小組與現有的 Microsoft Classroom 同步。
loginTypePictureDescription: 您即將建立學生的帳號。學生會使用通關圖片來登入。
loginTypePictureResetDescription: 如果你要重設一個學生的通關圖片，可以先選顯示通關圖片，接著選重置通關圖片。系統將產生新的通關圖片讓學生在登入時使用。
loginTypePictureLongDescription: 這個學習小組用了通關圖片作為通關方式。意思是說你的每個學生有個取代登入密碼的秘密圖片，可以透過上方的網址，用它來登入。
loginTypeSyncButton_failure: 發生錯誤。請按這裡再試一次。
loginTypeWordDescription: 您即將建立學生的帳號。學生會使用通關文字配對來登入。
loginTypeWordResetDescription: 如果你要重設一個學生的通關密語，可以先選顯示通關密語，接著選重置通關密語。你可以隨時重置，系統將產生新的通關密語讓學生在登入時使用。
loginTypeWordLongDescription: 這個學習小組使用通關密語作為通關方式。這個意思是說你的每個學生會有取代登入密碼的一對秘密單字，他們可以透過上方的連結，使用它來登入。
makerNewProjectDesc: Create a new App Lab app with Maker Toolkit enabled
makerSetupDesc: Having issues connecting to the Circuit Playground? Visit the setup page to better debug your issue.
makerViewProjectsDesc: Go to your project list to view all of your existing projects and continue working on them.
makeYourOwnFlappy: 製作自己的像素鳥遊戲
manageStudentsNotificationCannotAdd: You could not add {numStudents, plural, one {1 student} other {# students}} to your section. Please try again or refresh the page.
manageStudentsNotificationAddSuccess: You added {numStudents, plural, one {1 student} other {# students}} to your section.
minecraft2017Desc: Take your code to Minecraft: Education Edition! Copy or write down your share link.
minecraftMarketingDesc: Minecraft is back for the Hour of Code with a brand new activity! Journey through Minecraft with code.
missingRecommendedBlocksErrorMsg: 不完全正確。試試你還沒使用過的積木。
missingRequiredBlocksErrorMsg: 不完全正確。你還需要使用一個沒用過的積木。
moveStudentsConfirm: 不，我只想移動學生到新的學習小組。
name: 你的名字
nestedForSameVariable: 您在兩個以上的迴圈中使用相同的變數。請使用不同的變數名稱，以避免無限迴圈。
newSectionAdd: 加入新的教室學習小組
nextLevel: 恭喜！你完成了第 {puzzleNumber} 關。
nextLevelTrophies: 恭喜！你已經完成第 {puzzleNumber} 關，並且贏得了 {numTrophies, plural, one {1 個獎盃} other {# 個獎盃}}。
nextStageTrophies: 恭喜！你已經完成 {stageName}，並贏得了 {numTrophies, plural, one {1 個獎盃} other {# 個獎盃}}。
nPoints: {numPoints, plural, one {1 個點數} other {# 個點數}}
numBlocksNeeded: 恭喜！你完成了第 {puzzleNumber} 關（你可以只用 {numBlocks, plural, one {1 個積木} other {# 個積木}}來過關嗎？再試一次吧！）
numLinesOfCodeWritten: 你剛剛寫了：{numLines, plural, one {1 行} other {# 行}}的程式碼。
orientationLock: 關閉設備上的屏幕旋轉鎖定。
onetimeHintPromptMessage: 按一下燈泡來顯示提示
pairingNavigatorWarning: 你與夥伴{driver}一起完成了這個關卡。
pairingNavigatorLink: 點擊此處觀看小組的解決方案。
playzoneArtistDescription: 和小藝術家一起畫出酷炫的圖案！
playzonePlaylabDescription: 在 Play Lab 上創作故事或是遊戲！
playzoneSecondaryHeader: 詢問你的老師下一步該做什麼
predictionInstructions: 在運行這個程式前，先預測一下。
professionalLearningDescription: 我們高評價的專業學習為你準備了你未來的計算機科學課程。
projectGalleryCardDescription: 分享你的創作，或是從這些來自世界各地的學生作品中找尋靈感。
projectGroupEventsViewMore: 檢視更多與事件有關的遊戲專案
projectGroupMinecraftViewMore: 檢視更多 Minecraft 專案
projectGroupPlaylab: Stories and Games with Play Lab
projectGroupPlaylabViewMore: 瀏覽更多 Play Lab 專案
projectSharingDialogHeader: Control sharing for App Lab / Game Lab / Web Lab projects
projectSharingDialogInstructions1: App Lab, Game Lab and Web Lab are programming environments that allow students to personalize and customize their creations through writing free-form text, uploading images and sounds, etc. By default, students under the age of 13 are not able to share their projects with others, but students aged 13 and over are.
projectSharingDialogInstructions2: If you want to be able to manage exactly which students can and can not share these project types, you can show the project sharing column by clicking the orange button below.
projectTypeAllProjectsApplab: 所有 App Lab 專案
projectTypeAllProjectsGamelab: 所有 Game Lab 專案
projectTypeAllProjectsGamelabBeta: 所有 Game Lab（測試版）專案
projectTypeApplabViewMore: 瀏覽更多 App Lab 專案
projectTypeGamelabViewMore: 瀏覽更多 Game Lab 專案
projectsSubHeading: 已經建立了超過 2400 萬個專案
projectWarning: 注意：你目前在大型專案中的一個關卡中。在這個關卡上所做的改變，也將反應在專案裡的其他關卡裡。
provideAge: Provide your age below and click OK to continue.
providerManagedSection: This section is managed by {provider}. Add students there, then re-sync this section.
publishToPublicGalleryWarning: 你將要發佈專案到公開的作品集，這表示任何人都會看到你的專案。請確定你的專案內容裡沒有任何不恰當的內容或個人資訊。
question: 問題
recommendedBlockContextualHintTitle: 試著用像這樣的程式積木來完成這個關卡。
relockStageInstructions: 「重新上鎖階段」以防止其他班級或學校之間分享答案。
removeStudentConfirm1: If your student currently logs in through a secret picture or secret pair of words, the student may no longer be able to log into their account if you remove them from your section. If this is the case, please give your student a chance to keep using their Code.org account by letting them create a personal login.
removeStudentConfirm2: Send home these instructions on how to create a personal login.
removeStudentConfirm3: Give them at least a few days to follow these instructions before you remove them.
removeStudentHeader: Are you sure you want to remove this student?
reviewResponses: 移至學習小組的評量/調查頁籤以觀看學生回饋情形。
runTooltip: 運行工作區裡由積木組合出的程式。
runtimeErrorMsg: 您的程式未成功運行。請刪除第 {lineNumber} 行並再試一次。
schoolInfoInterstitialDescription: 請在下方輸入你的學校資訊。
schoolInfoInterstitialTitle: 我們想要讓每個學生都能學習計算機科學 - 幫助我們紀錄學生進度！
schoolInfoInterstitialUnknownError: We encountered an error with your submission. Please try again.
schoolLocationSearchPlaceholder: Search for your city / town location
schoolNotFound: 我的學校不在清單裡（點擊此處以提供資料）
schoolNotFoundCheckboxLabel: I cannot find my school above
schoolNotFoundDescription: 抱歉，我們找不到你的學校。請在下面輸入資訊。
sectionsNotificationJoinExists: 你加入過學習小組 {sectionName} 了。
sectionsNotificationJoinFail: 加入學習小組 {sectionId} 時發生錯誤。
sectionsNotificationLeaveSuccess: 你離開了學習小組 {sectionName}。如果你是不小心離開的，可以使用學習小組代碼 {sectionId} 再次加入。
selectCleverSection: 選擇一個 Clever 學習小組
selectSectionInstructions: 選擇一個能夠上鎖/解鎖評量或調查的學習小組，點擊階段左側的上鎖按鈕。
selectStudentsToMove: Select students to move to a new section in the table. Select which section you want to move your students to in the dropdown below. Choose 'Other teacher' if you want to move students to a different teacher's section. Moving students will not clear their progress.
sendToPhone: 發送到手機（限美國地區）
setupCoursesTeacher: 為學習小組分配一個課程，或是創建你自己的課程。
setupCoursesStudent: 瀏覽 Code.org 的課程來找到你的下一個挑戰。
shareFailure: 抱歉，我們無法分享這個程式。
shareSettingEnableButton: 啟用分享進階的專案給所有的學生
shareSettingDisableButton: Disable sharing advanced projects for all students
shareSettingEnableButtonDescription: Sharing projects created through Code.org's advanced programming tools (App Lab, Game Lab, and Web Lab) is currently disabled for all of your students. If you would like to re-enable sharing, please click on the 'Enable sharing advanced projects for all students' button below.
shareSettingDisableButtonDescription: If you need to block your students from sharing projects created through Code.org's advanced tools (App Lab, Game Lab, and Web Lab) that allow students to write free-form text, upload their own images and sounds, etc., you can do so by clicking on the 'Disable sharing advanced projects for all students' button below.
shareSettingEnableDialog: By enabling sharing, your students will be allowed to share their projects created through Code.org’s advanced programming tools (App Lab, Game Lab, and Web Lab) with anyone by sharing their project link.
shareSettingDisableDialog: An important part of the student experience of using Code.org is the ability to share their projects and creations with others. With sharing disabled, students will not be able to share their creations created with our advanced programming tools (App Lab, Game Lab, and Web Lab) with anyone else besides their Code.org teachers. These advanced tools are designed for students that are over 13 or being used under a teacher or parent’s guidance.
shareSettingDisableDialogNote: Note that students will still be able to share projects created using the programming tools designed for younger students like Play Lab and Artist. These tools limit what students can create and do not allow for uploading any of their own assets. To protect students’ privacy, shared creations in the project gallery are labeled only with the first letter of a student’s name and an age range.
shareSettingMoreDetailsTooltip: App Lab / Game Lab / Web Lab sharing enabled?
shareWarningsAge: 請在下方提供你的年齡，並點擊確認繼續。
shareWarningsStoreData: Code Studio 建立的這個 app 是儲存了一些數據，這些數據將被任何使用者看到，所以請避免在此共享自己和他人的私密訊息。
sharingBlockedByTeacher: Sorry, you do not have permissions to share this project. If you want to be able to share your project, please ask your teacher to enable sharing of App Lab / Game Lab / Web Lab projects for your section from the 'Manage students' tab in their dashboard. They can do this by adding the project sharing column from the Actions settings menu.
showAnswersInstructions: 「顯示答案」將使評量變成唯讀模式。
signinForProgress: 已經有 Code.org 帳號了嗎，登入後你的進度才能儲存喔。
signinOrAge: 登入或提供你的年齡以便繼續
specialAnnouncementDescription: There are still spots available in our Professional Learning Program for middle and high school teachers. But act fast - seats are filling up. Apply today.
specialAnnouncementHeadingAppLab: JavaScript in the Hour of Code
specialAnnouncementDescriptionAppLab: Are your students ready for the next step? Our new App Lab tutorial lets them create their own app in JavaScript using either blocks or text. This year, we’ve upgraded our servers so your students can do activities signed in. Sign up to host an Hour of Code (Dec 4-10th) with your class today!
specialAnnouncementHeadingCelebs: The Hour of Code is here!
specialAnnouncementDescriptionCelebs: Share the apps and games your students are creating for the Hour of Code to win a video chat for your classroom with a celebrity!
stageNotFullyLocked: 此階段沒有對所有人上鎖。
standaloneToolsDescription: In addition to our courses, teachers can use App Lab and Game Lab in any course to teach students how to create apps, animations, and games in JavaScript. And, we have lessons and widgets to teach encryption, text compression, and other computer science concepts.
standardsAndFrameworkDescription: Code.org 課程對應的課程標準等相關資訊。
startOverBody: 此操作會重置這個關卡到初始狀態，並重設所有你已經添加或變更的資料。
studentLockStateInstructions: 使用下表控管個別學生的狀態。
submittableComplete: 評量提交後就不能修改囉，確定要提交嗎？
submittableIncomplete: 有些問題未完成，提交評量後你就無法修改囉，確定要這麼做嗎？
submittableSurveyComplete: You cannot edit your survey after submitting it. To preserve anonymity, your responses will also be cleared from this page. Are you sure you want to Submit?
submittableSurveyIncomplete: You left some questions incomplete. You cannot edit your survey after submitting it. To preserve anonymity, your responses will also be cleared from this page. Are you sure you want to Submit?
submittableUnsubmit: 取消提交你的評量會重置提交時間與日期，確定要這麼做嗎？
submitYourProjectConfirm: 專案提交後就不能修改囉，確定要提交嗎？
subtitle: 一個視覺化的編程環境
syntaxErrorMsg: 你的程式含一個錯誤。請刪除第 {lineNumber} 行並再試一次。
teacherCommunityDescription: 詢問課程相關內容、分享上課好點子，從其他的老師身上獲得幫助
teacherCourseHocDescription: 一小時玩程式活動（Hour of Code，每年 12 月展開，但任何時間都可以使用）讓計算機科學變得有趣易學。
teacherCourseHocLinkText: 查看更多 Hour of Code 教學
thumbnailWarning: 注意：在你發佈你的程式之前，必須先停止執行程式才能建立縮圖。
toggleBlocksErrorMsg: 您需要更正您程式中的一個錯誤，才能以積木顯示。
tooFewBody: Please select two answers before submitting.
tooManyBlocksMsg: 這個關卡可以用 <x id='START_SPAN'/><x id='END_SPAN'/> 個積木解決。
tooMuchWork: 您讓我做太多工作了！可以試著減少一些重複次數嗎？
topCourseExplanation: Continue lesson to jump to where you left off or view the whole course to see an overview of your progress.
totalNumLinesOfCodeWritten: 你總共寫了：{numLines, plural, one {1 行} other {# 行}}的程式碼！
tryBlocksBelowFeedback: 試著從下列程式積木中挑選一個用看看：
tryHOC: 試試一小時玩程式（Hour of Code）
tutorialUnavailableExplanation: Sorry, this tutorial is not available for younger students unless they signed in as part of a classroom with a teacher. We have many more tutorials for all ages.
typeName: (Type your first and last name below):
unattachedBlockTipBody: 沒有連接的積木將不會產生任何作用。如果你想要這些積木在程式中起作用，試著將它們連接到其它的積木上。
unexpectedError: 發生意外的錯誤，請再試一次。如果這種情況持續發生，請嘗試重新載入頁面。
unnamedFunction: 你有一個變數或函式沒有命名。別忘了給任何東西起個容易辨識的名字。
unsubmitYourProjectConfirm: 取消提交專案將會重置提交的日期，確定要取消？
verifiedResourcesDetails: This course provides extra resources which are only available to verified teachers.
verifiedResourcesNotice: Accessing locked lessons and answer keys
verifyStatementsforCode: Please verify the following statements before you can receive a code.
verifySignature: By signing below you commit to teach the second semester of CS Discoveries, including Unit 6, by the '18-'19 school year.
verifySingleCode: I have not received or used another discount code from Code.org to purchase a Circuit Playground kit.
verifyStudentCount: I taught Units 1, 2, and 3 of Code.org's CS Discoveries curriculum to a classroom of at least 10 students.
verifyYear: I plan on teaching Unit 6 (Physical Computing) of CS Discoveries to a classroom of at least 10 students by the end of the '18-'19 school year.
whichCourse: 不知道要教哪一課？從課程頁面找一門課指派到你的學習小組。
workspaceProjectTemplateLevel: This icon means that this level is part of a larger project. Changes will be saved across these levels.
yourSchoolAdminDesc: View resources on how to get started or expand opportunities
yourSchoolDescription: Join the thousands of schools who have already incorporated high quality computer science education into their curriculum and provide opportunities for the students in your local area.
yourSchoolHeading: Expand computer science at your school or district
yourSchoolMapDesc: Tell us what computer science offerings are available at your local school and, if you're an educator, make a pledge to help expand that access even further!
yourSchoolParentDesc: Take action to expand computer science in your school or district
